properties.entry: select * from ( SELECT A.NOTICE_NO, A.NOTICE_CONTENT, ITEM_NO, A.SHOP_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.REPLY_MEMBER_NO, ITEM_NM FROM NOTICE A JOIN ITEM USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE NOTICE_CONTENT = 1 AND STATUS = 1 AND SHOP_NO = ? UNION SELECT A.NOTICE_NO, A.NOTICE_CONTENT, ITEM_NO, A.SHOP_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.REPLY_MEMBER_NO, ITEM_NM FROM NOTICE A JOIN ITEM USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE NOTICE_CONTENT = 2 AND STATUS = 1 AND SHOP_NO = ? UNION SELECT A.NOTICE_NO, A.NOTICE_CONTENT, ITEM_NO, A.SHOP_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.REPLY_MEMBER_NO, ITEM_NM FROM NOTICE A JOIN ITEM USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE NOTICE_CONTENT = 2 AND STATUS = 1 AND REPLY_MEMBER_NO = ? UNION SELECT A.NOTICE_NO, A.NOTICE_CONTENT, ITEM_NO, A.SHOP_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.REPLY_MEMBER_NO, ITEM_NM FROM NOTICE A JOIN ITEM USING(ITEM_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_CONTENT = 2 AND A.STATUS = 1 AND A.MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY NOTICE_NO ) where rownum <= 5
